title: Kamala Harris Turns 60: A Birthday Amid Age Controversy In US Polls 2024
content: Kamala Harris celebrates her 60th birthday on Sunday, but it's US election rival Donald Trump whose age is under scrutiny after a series of rambling speeches and a bizarre dance party.
summary: Kamala Harris celebrates her 60th birthday on Sunday, but it's US election rival Donald Trump whose age is under scrutiny after a series of rambling speeches and a bizarre dance party.

title: A Near Miss And A Famous Kiss: King Charles In Australia
content: King Charles on Friday begins a six-day tour of Australia, the realm where he was briefly schooled, shared a famous seaside kiss, and had a close shave with a would-be assassin.
summary: King Charles on Friday begins a six-day tour of Australia, the realm where he was briefly schooled, shared a famous seaside kiss, and had a close shave with a would-be assassin.

title: NDTV Explains: Ex-Spy, 'Drug Smuggler', Plot To Kill Khalistani Terrorist
content: The US this week named n ex-Indian intelligence officer - once associated with the Research and Analysis Wing - as the shadowy central figure in a failed plot to kill Gurpatwant Pannun, a Khalistani terrorist.
summary: The US this week named n ex-Indian intelligence officer - once associated with the Research and Analysis Wing - as the shadowy central figure in a failed plot to kill Gurpatwant Pannun, a Khalistani terrorist.

title: US Schools Ban Over 10,000 Books In Dramatic Rise Amid New Censorship Laws
content: A recent report by PEN America revealed that over 10,000 books were banned in US public schools during the 2023-2024 academic year, a threefold increase from the previous year.
summary: A recent report by PEN America revealed that over 10,000 books were banned in US public schools during the 2023-2024 academic year, a threefold increase from the previous year.

title: CEO Pay Takes A Hit In 2023, Yet Stands At 290 Times Average Workers Salary
content: The analysis suggests that exorbitant CEO pay, driven by their leverage over corporate boards rather than performance.
summary: The analysis suggests that exorbitant CEO pay, driven by their leverage over corporate boards rather than performance.

title: List Of top Hamas Leaders Who May Succeed Yahya Sinwar As Next Chief
content: Yahya Sinwar, the Hamas leader who orchestrated the October 2023 assault on Israel and eluded capture for more than a year, was killed by Israeli forces yesterday in southern Gaza. Sinwar, 61, had spent two decades in Israeli prisons.
summary: Yahya Sinwar, the Hamas leader who orchestrated the October 2023 assault on Israel and eluded capture for more than a year, was killed by Israeli forces yesterday in southern Gaza. Sinwar, 61, had spent two decades in Israeli prisons.

title: Alien Landscape? Mars Reveals A Formation That Looks Like A Human Face
content: Mars, Earth's closest neighbor, has long captivated human imagination with the possibility of extraterrestrial life just a short rocket journey away.
summary: Mars, Earth's closest neighbor, has long captivated human imagination with the possibility of extraterrestrial life just a short rocket journey away.

title: Drone Footage Of Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar's Last Moments Released By Israel
content: Israel Defense Forces released drone footage of Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar's last moments. In his final moments, he is seen throwing an object at the drone.
summary: Israel Defense Forces released drone footage of Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar's last moments. In his final moments, he is seen throwing an object at the drone.

title: "War Can End Tomorrow If...": Netanyahu's Message After Killing Of Yahya Sinwar
content: Hours after Israel confirmed the killing of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the people of Gaza, saying the war can end as soon as tomorrow, if Hamas agrees to lay down its arms and return the hostages.
summary: Hours after Israel confirmed the killing of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the people of Gaza, saying the war can end as soon as tomorrow, if Hamas agrees to lay down its arms and return the hostages.

title: Influencer Sparks Outrage In Japan By Using Shinto Gate For Workout Video
content: Chilean gymnast and social media influencer Maria del Mar 'Marimar' Perez Banus has sparked outrage in Japan after using a sacred Shinto Torii gate for a workout video.
summary: Chilean gymnast and social media influencer Maria del Mar 'Marimar' Perez Banus has sparked outrage in Japan after using a sacred Shinto Torii gate for a workout video.

title: China Prefers Kamala Harris Over Trump As US President: Chinese Official
content: China will prefer Kamala Harris to Donald Trump as the next US presidential considering that bilateral ties deteriorated sharply during the latter's presidency leading to serious confrontation, a senior member of Chinese national advisory body said.
summary: China will prefer Kamala Harris to Donald Trump as the next US presidential considering that bilateral ties deteriorated sharply during the latter's presidency leading to serious confrontation, a senior member of Chinese national advisory body said.

title: Indian American Committee Launches Bollywood-Themed Video Supporting Harris
content: An Indian American Democratic fundraiser on Thursday released a new digital video titled "I WILL VOTE FOR KAMALA HARRIS-TIM WALZ" to rally the South Asian voters in key battleground states.
summary: An Indian American Democratic fundraiser on Thursday released a new digital video titled "I WILL VOTE FOR KAMALA HARRIS-TIM WALZ" to rally the South Asian voters in key battleground states.

title: Ex Indian Spy Charged In US Over Alleged Khalistani Terrorist Murder Plot
content: The United States has charged a former Indian intelligence officer for allegedly orchestrating a failed plot to kill Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun residing in New York City.
summary: The United States has charged a former Indian intelligence officer for allegedly orchestrating a failed plot to kill Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun residing in New York City.

title: Hezbollah To Escalate War With Israel After Hamas Leader Sinwar Killed
content: Sinwar, a mastermind of the October 7, 2023, attack that triggered the Gaza war, was killed during an operation by Israeli soldiers in the Palestinian enclave on Wednesday, a pivotal event in the year-long conflict.
summary: Sinwar, a mastermind of the October 7, 2023, attack that triggered the Gaza war, was killed during an operation by Israeli soldiers in the Palestinian enclave on Wednesday, a pivotal event in the year-long conflict.

title: "Spirit Of Resistance Will Be Strengthened": Iran After Sinwar's Killing
content: Iran's mission to the United Nations said Thursday the killing of Yahya Sinwar would lead to the strengthening of "resistance" in the region, hours after Israel said it had killed the Hamas chief.
summary: Iran's mission to the United Nations said Thursday the killing of Yahya Sinwar would lead to the strengthening of "resistance" in the region, hours after Israel said it had killed the Hamas chief.

title: How Israeli Military Tracked And Killed Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar In Gaza
content: The Israeli military on Thursday told how Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar was killed in a firefight after being tracked "going from home to home" desperately seeking to avoid detection in southern Gaza.
summary: The Israeli military on Thursday told how Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar was killed in a firefight after being tracked "going from home to home" desperately seeking to avoid detection in southern Gaza.

title: Smashed Hotel Room, Drugs Found As Liam Payne Death Probe Unfolds
content: One Direction pop star Liam Payne died of multiple traumas and internal bleeding after plunging from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires, prosecutors said on Thursday, adding an initial search suggested the fall came after substance abuse.
summary: One Direction pop star Liam Payne died of multiple traumas and internal bleeding after plunging from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires, prosecutors said on Thursday, adding an initial search suggested the fall came after substance abuse.

title: Netanyahu Says Yahya Sinwar Killing "Beginning Of End" Of Gaza War
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said late Thursday that the killing of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar was the "beginning of the end" of the war in Gaza.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said late Thursday that the killing of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar was the "beginning of the end" of the war in Gaza.

title: Trump, Oldest To Run For President, Says "Only Stupid People Put Old In..."
content: Donald Trump has said "only stupid people put old people" in positions on the Supreme Court - ironically letting slip that he himself is a 78-year-old running for the highest office in the US government.
summary: Donald Trump has said "only stupid people put old people" in positions on the Supreme Court - ironically letting slip that he himself is a 78-year-old running for the highest office in the US government.

title: What If Trump Refuses To Accept A Loss? Could It Lead To Civil Unrest?
content: Donald Trump has never been one to abide by rules. Four years ago he cried fraud and did not accept the election results and there could be a possibility of him doing the same this time around after the November 5 election.
summary: Donald Trump has never been one to abide by rules. Four years ago he cried fraud and did not accept the election results and there could be a possibility of him doing the same this time around after the November 5 election.
